content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #112

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira on behalf of @bvdh
Chapter/section: Overview
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary: Enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader

Comment: Enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader.

Suggestion: replace "in real time to show" to "in real time allowing them to show"

Existing wording: The FHIRcast specification describes the APIs and interactions to synchronize healthcare applications in real time to show the same clinical content to a user.
Proposed wording: The FHIRcast specification describes the APIs and interactions to synchronize healthcare applications in real time allowing them to show the same clinical content to a user.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

wmaethner commented on Issue #112:

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (7-24-2019)
Block vote 3

Ricardo Quintano Neira moved the following disposition, seconded by @isaacvetter

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 11
:expressionless: Abstain: 1
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
